channel.title: Quest tab help (Client.java & ClickingButtons.java) Reward!
channel.description:
Hey Guys, I am trying to add a new questtab for my P.I so people can spawn from their and I am using this tutorial http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,494503.0.html and if some one can add it to me client.java and ClickingButtons.java I will give them 4$ or 3M RSGP once their done.
Cleint.java http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23654661/Client.java
ClickingButtons.java http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23654661/ClickingButtons.java
Thank you!

item.title: Quest tab help (Client.java & ClickingButtons.java) Reward!
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

go to client sided to rsinterface.java
search for Interfaces/QuestTab
add this under the last setbounds

addHoverText(29295, "Buy items:", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29296, "Melee Set", "Buy", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29297, "Mage Set", "Buy", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29298, "Range Set", "Buy", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29299, "Vengeance Runes", "Buy", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29300, "Barrage Runes", "Buy", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29301, "Supplies", "Buy", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29302, "", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29303, "Options:", "", TDA, 0, 0xFF981F, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29304, "Option 1", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29305, "Option 2", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29306, "Option 3", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29307, "Option 4", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29308, "Option 5", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29309, "Option 6", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29310, "Option 7", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29311, "Option 8", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29312, "Option 9", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29313, "Option 10", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addHoverText(29314, "Option 11", "", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150);

item.title: Quest tab help (Client.java & ClickingButtons.java) Reward!
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

i want help u if u want.
Edit: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18131831/PK%20TAB.rar
here i updated you’re client.java and clickingbuttons.java
And this is for the other members that want this in the source.
first in clickingbuttons.java search for case 59135://viewing orb middle
Then under that method add this

[code] /** Quest Tab Buttons **/
case 114112://Melee Set
if (c.inWild() && !c.isInBank()) {
c.sendMessage(“You cannot do this right now!”);
} else if(c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 6) {
c.sendMessage(“You need atleast 7 free slot’s to use this feature.”);
} else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 400000)) {
c.getItems().deleteItem2(995, 400000);
c.getItems().addItem(10828, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(1127, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(1079, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(1201, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(4587, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(1725, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(3105, 1);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need atleast 400,000 coins to use this feature.”);
}
break;

		case 114113://Mage Set
		if (c.inWild() && !c.isInBank()) {
			c.sendMessage("You cannot do this right now!");
		} else if(c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 11) {
			c.sendMessage("You need atleast 12 free slot's to use this feature.");
		} else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 450000)) {
			c.getItems().deleteItem2(995, 450000);
			c.getItems().addItem(4091, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(4093, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(2412, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(4675, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(1381, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(3840, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(554, 1000);
			c.getItems().addItem(555, 1000);
			c.getItems().addItem(556, 1000);
			c.getItems().addItem(557, 1000);
			c.getItems().addItem(558, 1000);
			c.getItems().addItem(562, 1000);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need atleast 450,000 coins to use this feature.");
		}
		break;

		case 114114://Range Set
		if (c.inWild() && !c.isInBank()) {
			c.sendMessage("You cannot do this right now!");
		} else if(c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 8) {
			c.sendMessage("You need atleast 9 free slot's to use this feature.");
		} else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 400000)) {
			c.getItems().deleteItem2(995, 400000);
			c.getItems().addItem(10499, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(2491, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(2503, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(2497, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(9185, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(861, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(9242, 1000);
			c.getItems().addItem(892, 500);
			c.getItems().addItem(3749, 1);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need atleast 400,000 coins to use this feature.");
		}
		break;

		case 114115:// Vengeance Rune Set
		if (c.inWild() && !c.isInBank()) {
			c.sendMessage("You cannot do this right now!");
		} else if(c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 2) {
			c.sendMessage("You need atleast 3 free slot's to use this feature.");
		} else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 150000)) {
			c.getItems().deleteItem2(995, 150000);
			c.getItems().addItem(9075, 400);
			c.getItems().addItem(560, 200);
			c.getItems().addItem(557, 1000);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need atleast 150,000 coins to use this feature.");
		}
		break;

		case 114116://Barrage Rune Set
		 if (c.inWild() && !c.isInBank()) {
			c.sendMessage("You cannot do this right now!");
		} else if(c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 2) {
			c.sendMessage("You need atleast 3 free slot's to use this feature.");
		} else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 200000)) {
			c.getItems().deleteItem2(995, 200000);
			c.getItems().addItem(560, 400);
			c.getItems().addItem(555, 600);
			c.getItems().addItem(565, 200);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need atleast 200,000 coins to use this feature.");
		}
		break;

		case 114117://Supplies
		 if (c.inWild() && !c.isInBank()) {
			c.sendMessage("You cannot do this right now!");
		} else if(c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 19) {
			c.sendMessage("You need atleast 20 free slot's to use this feature.");
		} else if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 300000)) {
			c.getItems().deleteItem2(995, 300000);
			c.getItems().addItem(2438, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(2436, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(2442, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(2440, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(3040, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(139, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(139, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(139, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(385, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(385, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(385, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(385, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(385, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(385, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(385, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(385, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(385, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(385, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(385, 1);
			c.getItems().addItem(385, 1);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("You need atleast 300,000 coins to use this feature.");
		}
		break;

[/code]
Now i explain what this will mean.

The 995 is the money id and the 300000 is how much it will cost to spawn it.
So you will need 300k to spawn it.
Then this.

This will delete the 300k so u get the Sets.

Now open up client.java and search for …

public void process() {
You will see

getPA().sendFrame126("Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 640);
etc…
Just add under a sendframe126 this.

getPA().sendFrame126("Buy items:", 29295); getPA().sendFrame126("Melee Set @yel@[400k]", 29296); getPA().sendFrame126("Mage Set @yel@[450k]", 29297); getPA().sendFrame126("Range Set @yel@[400k]", 29298); getPA().sendFrame126("Vengeance Runes @yel@[150k]", 29299); getPA().sendFrame126("Barrage Runes @yel@[200k]", 29300); getPA().sendFrame126("Supplies @yel@[300k]", 29301);

Read full topic
